S072.Q1. SINCE YOU HAVE BEEN AT YOUR PRESENT CAMP OR STATION, ABOUT HOW OFTEN DO YOU GO TO A USO CLUB IN A TOWN OR CITY NEAR YOUR CAMP?  1. THREE OR MORE TIMES A WEEK 2. TWICE A WEEK 3. ONCE A WEEK 4. ONCE EVERY TWO OR THREE WEEKS 5. ONCE A MONTH 6. LESS THAN ONCE A MONTH 0. NO ANSWER

OVER 10 MILES UP TO 15 MILES 5. OVER 15 MILES UP TO 20 MILES 6. OVER 20 MILES UP TO 25 MILES 7. OVER 25 MILES UP TO 50 MILES 8. OVER 50 MILES 0. NO ANSWER

S072.Q4. ABOUT HOW LONG DID IT TAKE YOU TO GET FROM YOUR OUTFIT TO THIS USO CLUB TODAY? (COUNT THE TIME YOU SPENT WAITING AS WELL AS THE TIME YOU SPENT ACTUALLY TRAVELING.)  1. ABOUT 15 MINUTES 2. ABOUT 30 MINUTES 3. ABOUT AN HOUR 4. ABOUT AN HOUR AND A HALF 5. ABOUT TWO HOURS 6. MORE THAN TWO HOURS 7. I DID NOT COME FROM MY OUTFIT TO THIS USO CLUB TODAY 0. NO ANSWER

S072.Q5. COUNTING THIS VISIT, ABOUT HOW MANY TIMES IN THE PAST 30 DAYS HAVE YOU BEEN TO THIS USO CLUB?  01. 1 TIME 02. 2 TIMES 03. 3 04. 4 05. 5 06. 6-10 07. 11-15 08. 16-20 09. 21-30 10. OVER 30 TIMES 11. NONE 00. NO ANSWER

S072.Q6. ABOUT HOW MANY TIMES IN THE PAST 30 DAYS HAVE YOU BEEN TO OTHER USO CLUBS IN THIS TOWN AND OTHER TOWNS RIGHT AROUND YOUR CAMP?  01. 1 TIME 02. 2 TIMES 03. 3 04. 4 05. 5 06. 6-10 07. 11-15 08. 16-20 09. 21-30 10. OVER 30 TIMES 11. NONE 00. NO ANSWER

S072.Q7. ABOUT HOW MANY TIMES IN THE PAST 30 DAYS HAVE YOU BEEN TO OTHER USO CLUBS BESIDES THOSE IN TOWNS RIGHT AROUND YOUR CAMP?  01. 1 TIME 02. 2 TIMES 03. 3 04. 4 05. 5 06. 6-10 07. 11-15 08. 16-20 09. 21-30 10. OVER 30 TIMES 11. NONE 00. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 8 NOT CODED.
S072.Q9. ON WHAT DAY, BEFORE TODAY, WERE YOU LAST AT THIS CLUB?  1. SUNDAY 2. MONDAY 3. TUESDAY 4. WEDNESDAY 5. THURSDAY 6. FRIDAY 7. SATURDAY 8. I'VE NEVER BEEN HERE BEFORE 0. NO ANSWER

S072.Q10. WHEN YOU CAME TO THIS CLUB THE LAST TIME (THE TIME BEFORE THIS VISIT), DID YOU HAVE SOMETHING SPECIAL IN MIND YOU WANTED TO DO HERE?  1. YES, I HAD SOMETHING SPECIAL IN MIND I WANTED TO DO 2. NO, I DID NOT HAVE ANYTHING SPECIAL IN MIND I WANTED TO DO 3. I DON'T REMEMBER NOW 4. I'VE NEVER BEEN HERE BEFORE 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTIONS 11-14 NOT CODED.

S072.Q15. IS THIS USO CLUB CROWDED ON SATURDAYS AND SUNDAYS?  1. YES, IT IS VERY CROWDED HERE ON SATURDAYS AND SUNDAYS 2. YES, IT IS PRETTY CROWDED HERE ON SATURDAYS AND SUNDAYS 3. I'VE NEVER BEEN HERE BEFORE ON SATURDAYS OR SUNDAYS 0. NO ANSWER

S072.Q20A. "THE PEOPLE WHO WORK IN USO CLUBS ARE JUST INTERESTED IN THEIR JOBS AND DON'T CARE ABOUT US"*  1. AGREE 2. IN DOUBT 3. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S072.Q20B. "THE USO PEOPLE REALLY MAKE A FELLOW FEEL AT HOME"*  1. AGREE 2. IN DOUBT 3. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S072.Q20C. "THE PEOPLE WHO WORK IN USO CLUBS ARE FINE PEOPLE AND AND DO A GOOD JOB"*  1. AGREE 2. IN DOUBT 3. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S072.Q20D. "THE USO PEOPLE ARE ALWAYS TRYING TO GET US TO DO SOMETHING, WHEN ALL WE WANT TO DO IS TAKE IT EASY"*  1. AGREE 2. IN DOUBT 3. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S072.Q20E. "THE USO PEOPLE PUT IN A LOT OF TIME AND EFFORT TO GIVE US A GOOD TIME"*  1. AGREE 2. IN DOUBT 3. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S072.Q20F. "THE PEOPLE WHO WORK IN USO CLUBS DON'T MANAGE THEM VERY WELL"*  1. AGREE 2. IN DOUBT 3. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S072.Q20G. "THE USO PEOPLE ARE TOO ,GOODY-GOODY, TO SUIT ME"*  1. AGREE 2. IN DOUBT 3. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTIONS 21, 22, 23 NOT CODED.

S072.Q24. YOUR FRIENDS MAY HAVE DIFFERENT OPINIONS ABOUT USO CLUBS, BUT WHAT DO MOST OF YOUR FRIENDS IN THE ARMY THINK ABOUT THE USO CLUBS?  1. THEY LIKE THEM VERY MUCH 2. THEY LIKE THEM PRETTY MUCH 3. THEY DON'T LIKE THEM SO MUCH 4. THEY DON'T LIKE THEM AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S072.Q25. HOW IMPORTANT IS IT TO YOU PERSONALLY TO HAVE A USO CLUB WHERE YOU CAN GO DURING YOUR OFF-DUTY FREE TIME IN THE ARMY?  1. IT IS ABSOLUTELY NECESSARY 2. IT IS OF GREAT IMPORTANCE 3. IT IS OF MEDIUM IMPORTANCE 4. IT IS OF LITTLE IMPORTANCE 5. IT IS OF NO IMPORTANCE AT ALL 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S072.Q26. HAVE YOU EVER BEEN TO A USO CLUB BECAUSE YOU WERE ORDERED OR DETAILED TO GO?  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER

S072.Q27. IN YOUR OPINION, IS IT A GOOD IDEA OR A POOR IDEA TO ORDER OR DETAIL MEN TO GO TO A USO CLUB?  1. IT IS A GOOD IDEA TO DETAIL MEN TO GO TO A USO CLUB 2. IT IS A POOR IDEA TO DETAIL MEN TO GO TO A USO CLUB 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 28 NOT CODED.
S072.Q29. ARE YOU:  1. AN ENLISTED MAN 2. AN ENLISTED WOMAN (WAC) 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S072.Q30. ARE YOU:  1. SINGLE 2. MARRIED 3. DIVORCED OR SEPARATED 4. WIDOWED 0. NO ANSWER
S072.Q31. WHAT IS YOUR RACE?  1. WHITE 2. NEGRO 3. OTHER 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S072.Q32. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDAY?  01. 18 OR YOUNGER 02. 19 03. 20 04. 21 05. 22 06. 23 07. 24 08. 25 09. 26-29 10. 30-34 11. 35 OR OLDER 00. NO ANSWER

S072.Q33. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOOL?  1. LESS THAN 6TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 6TH GRADE 3. FINISHED 7TH GRADE 4. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 5. SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT FINISH 6. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 7. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH 8. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 0. NO ANSWER P. THE USO IS THINKING ABOUT SETTING UP SOME DISCUSSION GROUPS OR CLASSES TO HELP SOLDIERS WITH THE PROBLEMS THEY MAY HAVE AFTER THE WAR. THE NEXT FEW QUESTIONS ARE AIMED AT FINDING OUT WHAT SOLDIERS EXPECT TO DO AFTER THE WAR, AND HOW THE USO CAN BEST HELP THEM.

S072.Q34. WHAT WERE YOU DOING JUST BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY?  1. I WAS UNEMPLOYED 2. I WAS WORKING 3. I WAS GOING TO HIGH SCHOOL 4. I WAS GOING TO COLLEGE 5. 2 AND 3 OR 2 AND 4 CHECKED 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 35 NOT CODED.

S072.Q36. WERE YOU RUNNING YOUR OWN BUSINESS OR WERE YOU WORKING FOR SOMEBODY ELSE?  1. I WAS RUNNING MY OWN BUSINESS 2. I WAS WORKING FOR A COMPANY THAT EMPLOYED LESS THAN 5 PEOPLE 3. I WAS WORKING FOR A COMPANY THAT EMPLOYED MORE THAN 5 PEOPLE 4. I WASN'T WORKING JUST BEFORE I CAME INTO THE ARMY 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S072.Q37. WHAT DO YOU EXPECT TO DO WHEN YOU GET OUT OF THE ARMY?  1. GO TO HIGH SCHOOL 2. GO TO COLLEGE 3. GO BACK TO MY OLD LINE OF WORK 4. GO INTO SOME OTHER LINE OF WORK 5. SCHOOLING AND WORK CHECKED 6. I EXPECT TO STAY IN THE ARMY 7. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S072.Q38. ARE YOU REASONABLY SURE OF GETTING A JOB AFTER THE WAR?  1. YES, I HAVE BEEN PROMISED MY OLD JOB BACK 2. YES, I EXPECT TO HAVE MY OWN BUSINESS 3. YES, I AM REASONABLY SURE I'LL FIND A JOB 4. NO, I AM NOT SURE I'LL FIND A JOB 5. UNDECIDED 6. I EXPECT TO STAY IN THE ARMY 7. I EXPECT TO GO BACK TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL 0. NO ANSWER
S072.Q39. ARE YOU WORRIED OR NOT WORRIED ABOUT FINDING A GOOD JOB AFTER THE WAR?  1. I AM VERY WORRIED 2. I AM SOMEWHAT WORRIED 3. I AM NOT SO WORRIED 4. I AM NOT WORRIED AT ALL 5. NO ANSWER
S072.Q40. WHAT DO YOU THINK USO CLUBS COULD DO NOW TO HELP YOU WITH THE JOB PROBLEMS YOU MAY HAVE AFTER THE WAR?  1. HAVE DISCUSSIONS ABOUT JOB OPPORTUNITIES AFTER THE WAR 2. NOT CHOSEN
